ingredients: 1 cup soy milk,   +   1/2 cup rolled oats, 14  frozen strawberries, 1  banana, broken into chunks, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons white sugar (Optional),   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 4%, Saturated Fat 1g 3%, Sodium 63mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Protein 7g, Calcium 41mg 3%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 217mg 5%
